short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you forget to choose GPT4 from ChatGPT's drop down?  Problem solved.  This simple plugin will automatically choose GPT4 for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you forget to choose GPT4 from ChatGPT's drop down? Problem solved. This simple plugin will automatically choose GPT4 for you.  And it is absolutely free.  Click to the "Add to Chrome" button now.
